Question
========

A person achieves a score of 13.8 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 12.9 with a standard deviation 3.3. The z-score of the person with 13.8 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.37
* 0.27
* 0.8

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.37: Incorrect
* 0.27: Correct
* 0.8: Incorrect
